onboarding.title: Welcome to Perfect Interview!
onboarding.description: Let's help you prepare for your next interview. Here's how it works:

1.title: Job Details
1.description: First, tell us about the job you're applying for. Enter the job title, description, and optionally the company details.

2.title: Upload Documents
2.description: Next, upload your resume, cover letter, or any other relevant documents. This helps us tailor the interview questions to your experience.

3.title: Generate Questions
3.description: Finally, we'll analyze everything and generate personalized interview questions. This could take a few minutes, but it's worth the wait!

jobPage.uploadQuestionsSuccess: Your questions have been added! You can now start practicing them.

onboarding.title: Practice Your Interview Answers
onboarding.description: Get instant feedback on your interview answers. Here's how it works:

1.title: Multiple Ways to Answer
1.description: Type your answer or use voice recording - whatever feels most natural to you.

2.title: Instant Feedback
2.description: Get detailed feedback on your answers, including strengths and areas for improvement.

3.title: Unlimited Practice
3.description: Practice as much as you want - there's no limit to how many times you can answer each question.

generateAnswerOnboarding.title: Let AI Answer For You

personalized.description: If you've uploaded your resume or cover letter, it will use your previous work experience to answer the question for you.

0.name: Emily Chen
0.title: Financial Analyst
0.quote: Perfect Interview gave me the confidence to ace my finance interviews. The mock questions were spot on and the resume builder helped me stand out in a competitive field.

1.name: Miguel Torres
1.title: Supply Chain Manager
1.quote: The practice interviews and instant feedback made a huge difference. I felt prepared for every scenario in my supply chain interviews.

2.name: Peter Kang
2.title: Restaurant Manager
2.quote: I loved how the AI tailored questions to my experience in hospitality. The resume builder made my achievements shine and helped me land my new role.

3.name: Robert Johnson
3.title: Operations Manager
3.quote: Perfect Interview's tools helped me prepare for tough operations questions and gave me the edge I needed to get promoted. Highly recommend for anyone in management!

0.q: What do I get with a subscription?
0.a: You get unlimited access to all features: resume builder, AI-powered interview questions, mock interviews, and Interview Copilot sessions.

1.a: Yes! You can cancel your subscription at any time from your account dashboard. You'll keep access until the end of your billing period.

2.a: Absolutely. If you're not satisfied, contact us within 7 days of starting your subscription for a full refund â€” no questions asked.

3.a: All payments are processed securely with industry-standard encryption. We never store your payment details.

4.a: Yes, your data is private and will never be shared without your consent. You control your information at all times.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: Does Perfect Interview Generate Questions Based On My Past Experience?
faq.a1: Yes! Perfect Interview generates questions based on your past experience, resume, and target job position. The questions are tailored to your personal experience and the job you're applying for.
faq.q2: Is there a limit to how many questions I can generate?
faq.a2: We currently set an upper limit of 200 practice questions per job. If you need more, please contact us and we can increase this limit for you.
faq.q3: What types of jobs does Perfect Interview support?
faq.a3: Perfect Interivew supports every single job in the world. As long as you upload the job description, we will be able to generate unlimtied practice questions for you.
faq.q4: Is there a limit to how many mock interviews I can do?
faq.a4: There is no limit to how many mock interviews you can do. Each mock interview is unique and tailored to the job you're applying for.
faq.q5: What types of jobs does perfect interview support
faq.a5: Perfect Interview supports every single job in the world. As long as you upload the job description, we will be able to create interview questions and interview copilots for you..

onboarding.title: Interview Copilot Setup Guide
onboarding.description: Follow these steps to set up your interview session

1.title: Open Your Interview in Chrome
1.description: To use the Interview Copilot, you must open up your interview in a Google Chrome tab.
1.description2: The Interview Copilot will not work with other browsers or if you open the interview in a desktop application â€” it MUST be in a Chrome tab.
1.description3: Select your meeting platform to see specific instructions on how to open it in Chrome.

zoom.name: Zoom
zoom.instruction: Open your Zoom meeting in Chrome instead of the desktop app:

teams.name: Microsoft Teams
teams.instruction: Open your Teams meeting in Chrome instead of the desktop app:

meet.name: Google Meet
meet.instruction: Google Meet opens in Chrome by default:

2.title: Share Your Meeting Tab
2.description: Click the "Select Interview Meeting Room" button and choose the Chrome tab with your meeting.

shareTabInstructions.mustShare: You MUST share the Chrome tab with the "Also share tab audio" option enabled.
shareTabInstructions.doNotShare: DO NOT share "window" or "entire screen" or else the Interview Copilot will not work.

3.title: Start the Interview Copilot
3.description: After sharing your interview tab, click the "Start Interview Copilot" button to begin.

exitWarning.title: Warning: Unsaved Recording
exitWarning.description: You have an unsaved interview recording. If you exit now, your recording will be lost.
exitWarning.instruction: To save your recording, please click the "End Interview Copilot" button before leaving.

resumeBuilder.createResumeInitialMessage:
Hi! I'll help you create a professional resume, but I need to get to know you a bit first.


Could you tell me your name, some general contact info like your email address, your previous work/education history, and some relevant work skills you have?


Once I gather this info, I'll create an initial draft of your resume, and then we can continue editing it to make it perfect.
resumeBuilder.editResumeInitialMessage:
Hi! I'll help you edit your resume. What would you like to change?
 I can change anything you want â€” add a new section, edit an existing one, or even change the order.
resumeBuilder.chooseSectionTypeDescription: Select the type of section you want to add to your resume
resumeBuilder.detailedSectionDescription: For work experience, education, or projects with titles, dates, and bullet points
resumeBuilder.listSectionDescription: For skills, technologies, or simple lists of items

transform.title: Transform Your Resume To Match Any Job Description
transform.description1: Stop submitting a generic resume to every job you apply to.
transform.description2: Instead, submit a resume that is 100% tailored to every single job you apply to so you maximize the chances that you get the interview.
transform.description3: All you need to do is upload the job description, and we'll take care of the rest.
transform.description4: In the end you will get a perfectly formatted resume that has all of your information, but updated to specifically match the job description.

knowledgeBase.initialMessage:
Hi there! ðŸ‘‹

I'm your AI career coach. This is your personal knowledge base where we'll store all your career information to help create better resumes and interview prep materials.

What you can do:
- **Upload files**: Resumes, cover letters, work documents
- **Chat with me**: Share additional work experience and details

What would you like to add to your knowledge base today?
knowledgeBase.initialOnboardingMessage: Hi! Let's build your knowledge base. This will help me create personalized resumes and interview answers for you. Tell me about your work experience, skills, and achievements.
knowledgeBase.congratulationsDescription: You've successfully created your knowledge base! Now you can use this information to build your resume, prepare for interviews, or get real-time help during interviews.

content: We will create a personalized profile about you and your career so that moving forward, every single tool in our suite is 100% customized to you.

resumeBuilder.title: Resume Builder
resumeBuilder.description1: Build a perfectly formatted resume in minutes, not hours.
resumeBuilder.description2: Build a recruiter-ready resume in minutes that's optimized for real results â€” highlighting your strengths, using the right keywords, and formatting it so you actually stand out.

interviewPrep.title: Interview Prep
interviewPrep.description1: Know the questions before the interview starts.
interviewPrep.description2: Upload the job description and our AI will predict what they'll ask and will help you craft answers that are sharp, relevant, and confident.

interviewCopilot.title: Interview Copilot
interviewCopilot.description1: Our AI Copilot listens to the questions you're being asked in real time and quietly feeds you the perfect answer based on your resume and job description.
interviewCopilot.description2: No awkward pauses. No rambling. Just smooth, confident responses that make you sound like the best version of yourself. And yes, it's 100% undetectable.

transformResume.title: Transform Resume
transformResume.description1: Stop applying to jobs with a generic resume that gets ignored
transformResume.description2: Enter any job description and then we will transform your resume to be 100% customized to the job, improving your chances of getting the interview.

testimonials.title: Success Stories
testimonials.description: Join +3,000 job seekers who trust Perfect Interview

testimonial1.quote: Creating a unique resume that is customized to every job I apply for is incredible. I always knew I should do this, but I was too lazy to do it myself. Perfect Interview does it for me, and it's incredible.
testimonial1.author: Sarah M.

testimonial2.quote: The Interview Copilot feature saved me in my last interview. I didn't know what to say, and I was so nervous. The copilot answered all the questions and made me feel so at ease.
testimonial2.author: Michael T.

testimonial3.quote: I am obsessed with the interview prep feature. The practice questions it generates are so helpful, and the mock interview feature really gave me all the confidence in the world going into my job interview.
testimonial3.author: Kelly F.

0.q: What do I get with a subscription?
0.a: You get unlimited access to all features: resume builder, AI-powered interview questions, mock interviews, and Interview Copilot sessions.

1.a: Yes! You can cancel your subscription at any time from your account dashboard. You'll keep access until the end of your billing period.

2.a: Absolutely. If you're not satisfied, contact us within 7 days of starting your subscription for a full refund â€” no questions asked.

3.a: All payments are processed securely with industry-standard encryption. We never store your payment details.

4.a: Yes, your data is private and will never be shared without your consent. You control your information at all times.
